title: Did the 180-day countdown begin to disclose alien objects with the COVID-19 relief bill?
subtitle: The Intelligence Licensing Act was included in the same draft comprehensive expenditure bill as the COVID-19 Relief Bill, which called for a non-confidential report on foreign objects.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In December 2020, a comprehensive federal spending bill was launched, which included the 180-day countdown of COVID-19 relief to a non-confidential report on the detection of foreign objects.
